collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
### What Personal Information About Customers Does Ghana Revenue Authority
Gather?

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Here are the types of
information we gather.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
* __

Information You Give Us: We receive and may store any information you enter on
our Web site or give us in any other way.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
* __

Automatic Information: We receive and store certain types of information
whenever you interact with our website.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
For example, like many web sites, we
sometimes use “cookies,” and we obtain certain types of information when your
Web browser accesses our website.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
#### Information You Give Us

You provide most such information when you search, or send messages via our
website or email to Ghana Revenue Authority.

collection.label: VAGUE
collection.sentence:
As a result of those actions, you
might supply us with such information as your name, address, and phone
numbers.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
#### Automatic Information

For security purposes Ghana Revenue Authority sometimes collects and analyzes
the Internet protocol (IP) address used to connect your computer to the
Internet, and to our website.
